import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import "../styles/productCard.css" const ProductCard = (props) => { //console.log(props.itemID) const {itemID, itemName ,itemImage, itemPrice} = props.item; const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const updateOrDeleteItem = () => { setShow(true) } const handleClose = () => { setShow(false) } return (
{itemName}

${itemPrice}

Add Item
Item Name setItemName(e.target.value)} ref={itemRef} required /> Item Description setItemDescription(e.target.value)} ref={itemRef} required /> Item Price setItemPrice(e.target.value)} ref={itemRef} required /> Item Image setItemImage(e.target.value)} ref={itemRef} required /> Section ID setSectionID(e.target.value)} ref={itemRef} required /> Restaurant ID setRestaurantID(e.target.value)} ref={itemRef} required />
) } export default ProductCard
